record.description: University of Chicago holds Homecoming without football. Satirical skits along with other frivolities, but no football, greet some 5,000 alumni returning to the campus today for the annual homecoming. The Kappa Sigmas present "Hutchins Goes to Persia for Donations." First row: Jack Edelbrock (portraying Hutchins) Walter Barlow, Alfred Schoor, and Wayne Boutell; second row: Norman Foster, Ivan Keever, Charles Noble, George Mayrose, and Hubert Westhoff.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
